title: Comer con Corazon
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves vegetarian menus every Mon, Tue and Thur (Wed & Fri by request). Uses organic fruits, vegetables and herbs. Serves local, Peruvian cuisine with a European note. The restaurant is a social business of "Corazones para Per√∫", which itself is a NGO and non-profit organization; all of the money that comes in goes to this organization. Located on the 3rd floor of the old market in the center of Urubamba and has 16 seats. If requested, the number can be increased.
